definition: to go on the rampage/to riot/to run amuck

horizontal/across/crosswise/horizontal stroke (in Chinese characters)/to place (sth) flat (on a surface)/to cross (a river, etc)/in a jumble/chaotic/(in fixed expressions) harsh and unreasonable/violent
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
to oppress/to rule as a despot/to tyrannize

sentences.english: Stage I. Transverse fracture of medial malleolus or rupture of deltoid ligament.
sentences.chinese: 度內踝的橫行骨折或三角韌帶斷裂。

sentences.english: Be in Guangzhou, black tiger side and the North sea help two great vicious power run amuck at yellow Bu harbor.
sentences.chinese: 在廣州，黑虎幫和北海幫兩大惡勢力橫行於黃埔港。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the effect of one stage urethroplasty with the laterigrade preputial pedicle tube.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討橫行島狀皮瓣一期修復尿道下裂的療效。

sentences.english: There is no law and order and motorcycle gangs terrorize the country.
sentences.chinese: 世間沒有法律和秩序，只有飛車黨橫行霸道。

sentences.english: The transversal muscle fibre was not cut off, so the integrality of bladder neck was keeped.
sentences.chinese: 術中不切斷膀胱頸橫行肌纖維，保持其完整性。

sentences.english: A war that ravages our planet until it was consumed by death.
sentences.chinese: 戰爭在我們的星球橫行，直到徹底毀滅了這個世界。

sentences.english: The transverse fibers began to appear in the middle and inferior segments of CT near epicardium.
sentences.chinese: 從界嵴的中部向下，近心外膜側，開始出現橫行纖維。

sentences.english: These evil people are still playing tyrants.
sentences.chinese: 這些腐惡的勢力依舊橫行鄉里。

sentences.english: The more the reactionaries lash out, the more resistance they provoke.
sentences.chinese: 越是橫行霸道，就越發激起更強烈的反抗。

sentences.english: Will 2011 be the year of the copycat?
We've (barely) lived through a 40-year period in which investment banks have imposed themselves on us.
sentences.chinese: 我們勉強在過去投行橫行的40年間生存下來。

sentences.english: A new and lethal virus was on the loose.
sentences.chinese: 一種新的致命病毒正在橫行無忌。

sentences.english: A tornado rips across the Missouri Plains.
sentences.chinese: 龍捲風在密蘇里平原肆虐橫行。

sentences.english: Africa's richest country, not yet free of demons, is facing a year of decision.
sentences.chinese: 非洲最富之國，尚未惡人橫行，面臨抉擇之年。

sentences.english: Tenements spread across city landscapes, teeming with crime and filth.
sentences.chinese: 城市裏到處是出租房屋，犯罪橫行且污穢不堪。

definition: to bounce/to bounce back/to boomerang/to ricochet/rebound (of stock market etc)/bounce/backlash/negative repercussions
to touch (physically, one's feelings etc)/to touch on (a topic)
day after day/for several days running
to undulate/to fluctuate/wave motion/rise and fall
